LOGGER_ID.description: Chat id of a group where you'll get to know that your bot got started.

MONGO_DB_URI.description: A MongoDB Cloud database url from cloud.mongodb.com

OWNER_ID.description: Telegram id of the person who will known as owner of the bot.

START_IMG.description: Telegraph link of an image which you wanna set as start pic of the bot.

STRING_SESSION.description: Pyrogram String Session of Assistant Account

SUDO_USERS.description: User IDs of the users who will counted as admin everywhere (if more than one separate them by space).

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Support Group Link of your bot, Must start with https://t.me/

SUPPORT_CHANNEL.description: Support Channel Link of your bot, Your link must start with https://t.me/
